knimeNode.name: Duration to String
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts a duration to a string.

fullDescription.intro: Converts duration cells to string cells. The string representation of these durations can be either the ISO-8601, a short (using letters), or a long (using words) representation.

tab.name: Column Selection
tab.option: Only the included columns will be converted.

tab.name: Replace/Append Selection
tab.option: The selected columns will be appended to the input table. The suffix of the appended columns can be provided in the text field to the right.
The selected columns will be replaced by the new columns.

tab.name: Format Selection
tab.option: The durations will be formatted using the ISO-8601 representation, e.g. 'P2Y3M5D'.
The durations will be formatted using words to represent, e.g. '2 years 3 months 5 days'.
The durations will be formatted using letters to represent, e.g. '2y 3M 5d' (Date-based duration: y: years, M: months, d: days; Time-based duration: H: hours, m: minutes, s: seconds).
